org.opends.sdk
Interface ExtendedRequest<S extends Result>

Type Parameters:
S - The type of result.
All Superinterfaces:
Request
All Known Subinterfaces:
GenericExtendedRequest
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractExtendedRequest, CancelRequest, GetConnectionIDRequest, GetSymmetricKeyRequest, PasswordModifyRequest, PasswordPolicyStateExtendedOperation.Request, StartTLSRequest, WhoAmIRequest
public interface ExtendedRequest<S extends Result>
extends Request

The Extended operation allows additional operations to be defined for services not already available in the protocol; for example, to implement an operation which installs transport layer security (see StartTLSRequest).

          Returns the dotted-decimal representation of the unique OID corresponding to this extended request.

getControls

Iterable<Control> getControls()
Returns an Iterable containing the controls included with this request. The returned Iterable may be used to remove controls if permitted by this request.

Specified by:
getControls in interface Request
Returns:
An Iterable containing the controls.

hasControls

boolean hasControls()
Indicates whether or not this request has any controls.

Specified by:
hasControls in interface Request
Returns:
true if this request has any controls, otherwise false.
